author: Bloomberg
title: Key food prices are surging after virus upends supply chains
description: As the coronavirus pandemic penetrates more deeply into global supply chains, prices for key staples are starting to soar in some parts of the world.
content:
Its unclear what the biggest drivers were for the retail prices, whether it was a trickle-down effect from grain futures or local logistical choke points or panic buying, or a combination.
What is clear is that, while the world isnt about to run out of food … [+2011 chars]
